comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.163 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

(1) In testopia, go to product dashboard
(2) Select product, in main view select tab "Test Runs", mark several runs
(3) Click right, in context menu select "Reports" -> "Case roll-up report"


Actual results:

New page opens with bugzilla & testopia header and footer, and the heading "This is a Roll up report. Displayed are the most recent test results for each test case for run(s) 17,18,20,21,22,25,26,30." (numbers according to selected runs.) Apart from that the page is empty.


Expected results:

A report showing latest result per case.

comments.author: jacob.kanev@eemagine.com
comments.creator: jacob.kanev@eemagine.com

comments.raw_text:
We upgraded Testopia from 2.3 to 2.5 and see the same issue reported above. Please let us know when we could expect a fix for the issue as we use case roll-up reports frequently.

Thanks,
Vijay
comments.author: vijay.nagarajan@loadedtech.com.au
